format: A data frame with the following 22 variables.
description:
Description
These are episode-level data for RuPaul's Drag Race for all available seasons
(currently through Season 14). Data include all sorts of information.
title: RuPaul's Drag Race Episode Data

parameters.bottom1: a character vector for queen in the bottom 2 of that episode
parameters.numqueens: a numeric vector for number of queens at the start of the episode
parameters.bottom7: a character vector for the seventh queen in the bottom of that episode. Thanks, Season 14.
parameters.minicw1: a character vector for a mini-challenge winner
parameters.bottom3: a character vector for the third queen in the bottom of that episode. Thanks, Season 11.
parameters.episode: a numeric vector for the episode number
parameters.minicw3: a character vector for a third mini-challenge winner, where applicable
parameters.eliminated2: a character vector for the queen eliminated after the lip-sync, if there was a double-sashay that episode.
parameters.eliminated1: a character vector for the queen eliminated after the lip-sync
parameters.special: Is the episode a special (e.g. a reunited or clip show)
parameters.minic: a character vector describing the mini-challenge
parameters.minicw2: a character vector for a second mini-challenge winner, where applicable
parameters.runwaytheme: a character vector for runway theme, where applicable/available
parameters.bottom2: a character vector for queen in the bottom 2 of that episode
parameters.minicw4: a character vector for a fourth mini-challenge winner, where applicable
parameters.bottom4: a character vector for the fourth queen in the bottom of that episode. Thanks, Season 11.
parameters.lipsyncsong: a character vector for the lip-sync artist's song
parameters.airdate: a date for the episode air date
parameters.bottom6: a character vector for the sixth queen in the bottom of that episode. Thanks, Season 11.
parameters.bottom5: a character vector for the fifth queen in the bottom of that episode. Thanks, Season 11.
parameters.lipsyncartist: a character vector for the lip-sync artist
